Azwile Chamane-Madiba bụ onye  mba South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri.

N'afọ 2016, ọ weere onodu  nke "Zodwa" na ihe nkiri Akin Omotoso, Vaya, nke gosipụtakwara  Phuthi Nakene, Warren Masemola, Nomonde Mbusi, Zimkhitha Nyoka Ihe nkiri a nwetara ọtụtụ nhọpụta maka  Africa Movie Academy Awards (AMAA) nke agba iri n' ato ya na 2017.
